title.rendered: Valor Rectangle Coffee Table – Tuff Top

content.rendered:
The Valor Coffee Table, Rectangle, is part of our most budget friendly table range, but don’t let the low price fool you, the Valor Table Range is packed full of features and is built to last.

The Valor Table Range is made with a cast iron cruciform table base and a steel column, both powder coated in a smart black finish. The powder coated finish means it is knock and scratch resistant and perfect for busy environments. 

The 25mm thick Laminate Tuff Tops are made with a chipboard core and come with a 2mm ABS protective edge, designed to resist impact. Our Tuff Tops can also withstand 90 degrees Celsius. 

The Valor Table Range is easy to clean and comes with height adjustable feet for those pesky uneven surfaces. 

We also offer the Valor Table Range with Round, Square or Rectangle tops in Coffee, Dining and Poseur Height. We can also offer bespoke table top sizes and finishes.

Perfect for busy commercial venues, such as Coffee Shops, Restaurants, Hotels and more!

This item is a stock item and will require some self assembly. This item comes with a 5 year structural warranty. This item can’t be cut to a bespoke height. For bespoke table heights, please view our Merit Table Range.
